title: Major League Cricket tickets now available
body:
GRAND PRAIRIE, Texas — Tickets for the 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) season went on sale Wednesday morning, the league announced.

The season will be played throughout the month of July at two venues in the United States: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina. For a full breakdown of the season schedule here in North Texas and when the Texas Super Kings will play their matches, click here.

Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan, said the demand for presale tickets demonstrated the league’s presence has made an impact on the American cricket community.

“The enthusiasm for cricket in America is increasing rapidly, and we are delighted to provide fans across the nation the opportunity to witness top-tier cricket live in their own backyard," Srinivasan said.

Major League Cricket ticket price, information

Tickets for all matches, including the four playoffs, are available online through the official Cognizant Major League Cricket website. In addition to the world-class matches, fans have several ticket options to choose from, with general admission tickets starting at $30 per person.

The MLC also released an exclusive offer for cricket fans: Buy one, get one Free matches featuring Seattle Orcas vs. LA Knight Riders on July 9 and Washington Freedom vs. San Francisco Unicorns on July 22. Both matches will begin at 7:30 p.m. CST at Grand Prairie Stadium.

For those wanting more, tournament passes are available to ensure guaranteed access to all matches, including the playoff series. Premium hospitality tickets are also available, with VIP seating and boxes available, which include food and beverage packages designed for hosting guests in style.

title: Major League Cricket Tickets Available In Grand Prairie, Texas
body:
Tickets are now available for the 2024 season of Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC). Matches will take place throughout July at two prestigious locations in the United States: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

The MLC also unveiled a special deal for cricket enthusiasts, allowing them to purchase one ticket and get another free for the matches between Seattle Orcas and LA Knight Riders on July 9, and Washington Freedom versus San Francisco Unicorns on July 22. Both showdowns kick off at 7:30 p.m. at Grand Prairie Stadium.

"We are incredibly excited to unveil the schedule for the 2024 season," said MLC CEO, Vijay Srinivasan. "This promises to be our most thrilling season yet, with each of the MLC’s six teams actively recruiting in the off-season, adding a host of world-class player signings to their team rosters with more big names to be soon announced.”

Tickets for all matches are available online through the MLC website.

Expanding upon the success of its debut 2023 season, MLC prolonged the tournament in response to popular demand by adding six additional league matches.

The 2024 season kicks off on July 5 with two matches nationwide. Reigning champions MI New York, led by batter Kieron Pollard, will clash with Seattle Orcas, the 2023 runners-up featuring the star South African duo Wayne Parnell and Quinton de Kock, at Church Street Park in Morrisville.

Simultaneously, the Texas Super Kings, led by Faf du Plessis, will go head-to-head with the LA Knight Riders, led by Sunil Narine, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie.

The action-packed opening weekend continues with the Australian-packed Washington Freedom, boasting Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, Travis Head and coached by Ricky Ponting, squaring off against MI New York on Saturday, July 6. Meanwhile, the San Francisco Unicorns, strengthened by the explosive New Zealand opener Finn Allen, will host the LA Knight Riders on Sunday night at Grand Prairie Stadium.

title: Major League Cricket tickets go on sale for 2024 season
body:
With enthusiasm for cricket in America increasing rapidly, Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) encouraged fans to act fast to secure tickets for the highly anticipated 2024 season which went on sale Wednesday.

League’s inaugural 2023 season witnessed sell-out crowds and 2024 pre-sale tickets were in high demand following the recent season schedule announcement, according to a media release.

The fierce competition between the six teams in the MLC will begin Friday, July 5, when 2023 champions MI New York take on the Seattle Orcas in an unmissable rematch at Morrisville, North Carolina, at 3:30 PM EDT, followed by the Texas Super Kings vs. LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

The opening weekend features Washington Freedom vs MI New York on Saturday, July 6, at 3:00 pm EDT, and the San Francisco Unicorns vs LA Knight Riders on Sunday, July 7th at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

The tournament will roll into three weeks of nonstop T20 action, featuring international stars and the nation’s top domestic talent putting on a show.

With the likes of Glenn Maxwell (Washington Freedom) Jake Fraser-McGurk (San Francisco Unicorns), Nicholas Pooran (MI New York), Imad Wasim (Seattle Orcas), Devon Conway (Texas Super Kings), and Andre Russell (LA Knight Riders), this season promises unforgettable moments for fans of all ages, the release stated.

Tickets for all matches, including the four playoffs, are available online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website. In addition to the world-class matches, fans have several ticket options to choose from, with general admission tickets starting at $30 per person.

READ: Cognizant joins Major League Cricket as title partner (March 15, 2024)

The season’s excitement extends beyond the pitch, with entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.

The MLC has released an exclusive offer for cricket fans – Buy One, Get One Free matches featuring Seattle Orcas vs LA Knight Riders on July 9 and Washington Freedom vs. San Francisco Unicorns on July 22.

Both matches will begin at 7:30 PM CDT at Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas. This offer is perfect for families and large groups of friends who want to enjoy a perfect summer evening of cricket. It’s also an excellent opportunity for fans to introduce their friends to the sport.

READ: If inaugural season is an indication, Major League Cricket is here to stay (July 31, 2023)

For those wanting more, tournament passes are available to ensure guaranteed access to all matches – including the hotly contested playoff series. Premium hospitality tickets are also available, with VIP seating and boxes available, which include food and beverage packages designed for hosting guests in style.

Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan, said the demand for presale tickets demonstrated the league’s presence has made an impact on the American cricket community.

“The enthusiasm for cricket in America is increasing rapidly, and we are delighted to provide fans across the nation the opportunity to witness top-tier cricket live in their own backyard.

“We are gathering the world’s top players and organizing a spectacular event in the largest sporting market globally. The success of the first season has given us a foundation to establish one of the premier T20 leagues in the world. Our goal is to keep expanding the sport in the United States and offer the community an opportunity to engage with it, whether as fans or participants.”

READ: Breathtaking hundred by Heinrich Klaasen helps Seattle Orcas defeat MI New York (July 25, 2023)

“We are pleased to announce that season two tickets are on sale and encourage our fans to get their tickets quickly to ensure they don’t miss out on the action,” said Srinivasan.

Off the back of Major League Cricket’s first successful season and a momentum boost anticipated from the ICC T20 World Cup in the US in June – the 2024 season is primed to reach new heights with cricket fever to captivate the US this summer.

Tickets are available at tickets.majorleaguecricket.com

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is the first professional Twenty20 cricket championship in the United States. Exclusively sanctioned by USA Cricket, MLC showcases superstar players from around the globe, bringing world-class T20 cricket to America.

MLC’s transformative first season occurred in the summer of 2023 and featured six teams: the Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and the Washington Freedom.

title: Major League Cricket Unleashes 2024 Season Schedule, Marking a New Era of T20 Action in the United States
body:
SAN FRANCISCO, CA (Tuesday, 7 May 2024, EDT)—Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is thrilled to announce the highly anticipated schedule for the 2024 season, a significant milestone in the history of T20 cricket in the United States. The season promises an exhilarating lineup of matches featuring some of the world’s best international players and the nation’s top domestic talent.

Building on the momentum of its inaugural 2023 season, Cognizant Major League Cricket has extended the tournament due to demand with an extra six league matches. The four-game playoff series, to be hosted in Grand Prairie, TX, is set to captivate cricket fans across the globe.

The 2024 season will commence with two matches across the country on July 5th, headlined by MLC’s reigning champions, MI New York, featuring their elite West Indian batter Kieron Pollard, who will face off against 2023 runners-up Seattle Orcas headlined by star South African pair Wayne Parnell and Quinton de Kock, at Church Street Park in Morrisville at 3:30 PM EDT.

The Texas Super Kings, spearheaded by classy South African Faf du Plessis, will take on West Indian off-spinner Sunil Narine’s LA Knight Riders at the purpose-built Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, TX at 7:30 PM CDT.

The opening weekend also features the Australian-stacked Washington Freedom featuring Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, Travis Head, and coach Ricky Ponting, facing MI New York on Saturday, July 6, at 3:00 pm EDT. The San Francisco Unicorns, bolstered by hard-hitting opening New Zealand batter Finn Allen, will host the LA Knight Riders on Sunday night at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan can’t wait to see the passion and enthusiasm come to life with cricket fans across the country for the second season of Major League Cricket.

“We are incredibly excited to unveil the schedule for the 2024 season,” said Srinivasan.

“This promises to be our most thrilling season yet, with each of the MLC’s six teams actively recruiting in the off-season, adding a host of world-class player signings to their team rosters with more big names to be soon announced.

“With some of world cricket’s biggest current stars and seasoned veterans involved, including the likes of athletic Jamaican allrounder Andre Russell, New Zealand’s left-arm quick, Trent Boult, 2023 MLC Finals MVP Nicholas Pooran, Afghanistan’s superstar spinner, Rashid Khan, together with cricketing royalty in coaches Ricky Ponting, Shane Watson and Stephen Fleming, it demonstrates the depth of talent being attracted to the league.”

In addition to the highly anticipated matches, MLC remains committed to supporting the long-term infrastructure to foster the growth of localized cricket communities further while strengthening cricket’s presence in the US.

“Last year, we unveiled MLC at the newly upgraded Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina, and the brand new Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, which will both once again co-host the 2024 tournament, building on the impact of season one in those communities,” Srinivasan said.

“These venues will deliver world-class pitches and a vibrant atmosphere to support the overall MLC fan experience. Moreover, we are committed to exploring expansion opportunities with new cricket venues to support our six teams’ growing American fanbase.”

Off the back of Major League Cricket’s first successful season and a momentum boost from the ICC T20 World Cup in the U.S. in June – the 2024 season is primed to reach new heights with cricket fever to captivate the US this summer.

Tickets for all matches will go on sale in the coming weeks and can be purchased through the official Major League Cricket website. Fans are encouraged to secure their tickets early by registering for the pre-sale to ensure they don’t miss out on the action after sell-out crowds in 2023.
